partner.partnerRedirectClient: You must first logout from the clients site to access the partners site.

summary.line2: HERE YOU'RE THE ONE WHO KNOWS
summary.line3: And the experts to back you up
summary.line4: The vet is inviting you to register him as your expert.
summary.line5: If you agree, you must click on the link that will arrive in the email.
summary.line6: By accepting, your profile will be associated to our expert partner.
summary.line7: With each purchase that you make now on, he will be able to obtain benefits and commissions as long as any of you do not modify it in your profile.
summary.line8: We hope you start a long and lasting relationship.
summary.line10: Enter your email to send the invitation

commissions.noOrders: There are no orders in this period.

errors.notFound: No commissions generated during last period.
errors.cannotPay: Dear partner, the sending of the commission is only available during payment period, the first 10 days of the month.
errors.errorUpload: ¡Oh no! It looks like an error ocurred with the sending of the commission payment. Call us to 3951126579 so that we can solve it as soon as possible and you can continue receiving Keff Keff benefits.
errors.invalidFileType: The selected file has an invalid format, please make sure it is an XML file.

commissions.cfdiSuccess: Your CFDI has been uploaded successfully.
